reviews.text:
new sizzler store that js opened this year and charged me wrongly

menu says 2 dollar, passed her 2 dollar then ask to takeaway when she say 30 cent extra. passed her another 2 dollar and received 50 cent as change. ???

whimsical and fun place to study in!!!! good place for my eevee to zoomie in!!!

but bad place for those who need counselling support since this school has a severe lack of counsellors

If you're an arts student considering this JC, I'd advise you to think twice. Speaking as a former HELm student, the departments generally don't care about your progress and development in JC, aside from History and Math. Econs notes are extremely long-winded and unhelpful, and lit teachers don't really care whether you can keep up with the pace, regardless of whether you've taken lit before at O Levels or not. Exam papers are also not a good indicator of the actual As, which explains why the school's mean rp is pretty low. Also, if you're seeking help in dealing with stress, don't bother going to the school counsellor. In my previous experience, she made assumptions that I had autism just because I told her that my brother had it.

Rowdy tmjc students at bedok reservoir today.  I had problem running through the crowds of students blocking the path. The teachers should ask students to keep to the left all the time. Now n then heard the f words when running past these students.

As a visitor myself, I would say Tampines Meridian Junior College has a beautiful and alluring atmosphere. This is mostly bcs of the welcoming staff and students that ensure you are being well taken care of. Its giving camp vibesüôè
